itunes:title: #177 - Stop Feeling Like Shit with Andrea Owen
title: #177 - Stop Feeling Like Shit with Andrea Owen
description:
Andrea Owen of Your Kick-Ass Life joins us to talk about getting in tune with your intuition and emotions so you can master your reactions, attract more abundance, and stop feeling like shit in work and life.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting & Twenty20 & FabFitFun

Get full show notes for this episode here
